title: Finca El Origen 2016 Reserva Estate Torrontés (Salta)
description: Honeydew and nectarine aromas are fresh and representative of good Torrontés. This wine is round, oily and citric in feel, while lychee and green-melon flavors hold through the finish.

title: Eszterbauer 2015 Sógor Kadarka (Szekszárd)
description: This light ruby-colored wine is made from Kadarka grapes. It has cherry and Mediterranean herb aromas and raspberry, baking spice and dried cherry flavors. It's balanced, with soft tannins and a fruity finish.

title: Famiglia Meschini 2013 Magnifico Sparkling (Mendoza)
description: Peach and cantaloupe aromas are friendly and easy. A creamy palate with modest acidity offers slightly sweet flavors of dulce de leche and melon. A modest finish with spice and sugary notes closes this out.

title: Early Mountain 2014 Aylor Red (Virginia)
description: The nose shows black cherry, cherry cola, eucalyptus and toasty cedar. Brambly and leafy flavors open themselves to more cherry and eucalyptus on the palate and an enjoyably long and smokey finish.

title: Global Wines 2013 Cabriz Biologico Organic Red (Dão)
description: This wine is produced from organically grown grapes. It is aged in tank, giving a wine that is all blackberry fruit with a crisp texture as well as generous tannins. With touches of Dão minerality, the wine is ready to drink.

title: Global Wines 2015 Grilos Red (Dão)
description: Named after the crickets whose sound is heard in the Dão region in summer, this soft wine has a ripe texture and generous black fruits. Its acidity is balanced to give the wine weight. Drink now.

title: Cambridge 2015 Meritage (Napa Valley)
description: This combines all five red Bordeaux varieties, with half of the wine made from Cabernet Sauvignon. Juicy black cherry, cedar and integrated oak make for a straightforward, light-bodied and high-toned experience in the glass.

title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 White (Vinho Verde)
description: A blend of four Vinho Verde grapes, this dry wine is crisp and spicy, with an herbal character. It has bright fruitiness, plenty of acidity and a crisp, tight, mineral aftertaste.

title: Casanel 2015 Estate Chardonnay (Middleburg)
description: An intriguing nose of lemon, pineapple, vanilla and banana candies are encased in a waft of warm yeast. Flavors of honeydew, more pineapple and oak spice are folded into a saline and nutty component. The weight is plush and feels silky on the tongue.

title: Adega Cooperativa do Cartaxo 2015 Bridão Private Collection Red (Tejo)
description: A blend of Touriga Nacional and Alicante Bouschet, this is an intense wine, packed with tannins and with a firm structure that comes from the super-ripe grapes. Jammy and with black-coffee flavors, the wine is concentrated and needs to soften until 2018.

title: Blue Valley 2016 Viognier (Middleburg)
description: A high-toned array of peach, rosewater, mango and banana show on the nose and palate. The palate is mouth coating, with a pleasant roundness and a long and warming finish.

title: Bressia 2014 Monteagrelo Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description: Funky aromas of animal hide, compost and tea are challenging and require patience. This Cab is grippy and tannic on the palate. Flavors of stewed tomato, green herbs, oak and caramel never fully come together.

title: Clos Chapon 2016  Vouvray
description: The wine comes from vineyards on the plateau above the village of Vouvray. It is a ripe, lemon and honey-flavored wine with balanced acidity that creates a clean, crisp, perfumed and fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Coelho 2015 Atração Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description: This light-fruited wine is the most widely available of the winery's Pinots. Its cherry and orange candy flavors give it a pleasant, albeit superficial, entry. Don't expect complexity, but for a light and accessible taste of the Willamette Valley, it's a fair value.

title: Collina San Ponzio 2016  Dolcetto d'Alba
description: This straightforward Dolcetto has red berry and spice aromas and raspberry jam, clove and orange zest flavors. With its flexible tannins, it's ready to be enjoyed soon.

title: Creekside Cellars 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Colorado)
description: Spicy aromas of cedar and pepper are joined by warm notes of black currant and blackberry. Velvet tannins are well integrated on the palate, with flavors of baking spice, pepper and cedar alongside fruit notes of black currant and black cherry. The tannins linger on the finish, with more baking spice and cherry balanced by ample acidity.

title: Delaforce 2015 Red (Douro)
description: This wine is all fruit. Its black-currant flavors and attractive acidity come from a blend that is dominated by Tinta Roriz, Touriga Franca and Tinta Barroca. It has minerality and a dry edge, although its fruitiness means it is ready to drink.

title: Domaine du Vieil Orme 2016 Cuvée PHI Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
description: Produced from 25-year-old vines, this is a delicious, crisp and clean wine. It has attractive apricot and melon flavors that are cut with lime acidity. Drink this fruity wine now.

title: Domaine Tinel-Blondelet 2015 Domaine de la Croix-Canat La Vendangette  (Sancerre)
description: From the Sancerre vineyard of this Pouilly-Fumé producer, this is a ripe wine. Packed with apple and rich peppered-pear flavors, it is spicy, shot through with acidity and lightly mineral at the end. The wine is ready to drink.
designation: Domaine de la Croix-Canat La Vendangette

title: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova 2016 Monte da Peceguina Rosé (Alentejano)
description: The ripe, spicy strawberry and orange fruitiness of this wine is immediately attractive. It has lively acidity within a rich framework. Drink this refreshing wine now.

title: Jérôme Gueneau 2016 Domaine J. Gueneau Rosé (Sancerre)
description: This producer has a number of estates in Sancerre. This estate, bearing his own name, has produced a delicate, crisp and fruity wine. Its acidity and tight texture make this wine really food friendly.

title: Jérôme Gueneau 2016 Le Clos Chartier  (Sancerre)
description: A soft style, this is ripe with attractive apple and crisp pear fruits. The wine is refreshing with its acidity lacing through the flinty texture. The wine will be ready to drink from 2018.

title: Joseph Mellot 2016 Le Rabault Rosé (Sancerre)
description: Light, bright and packed with crisp fruit, this is a refreshing wine. Produced from Pinot Noir, it has red-cherry flavors along with a mineral texture and bright fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Giribaldi 2016 Campo del Pero  (Dolcetto d'Alba)
description: Made from organically grown grapes, this Dolcetto has ripe black-skinned berry and nutmeg aromas. The palate evokes ripe black cherry and clove. It's straightforward, with rounded tannins, and should be drunk soon.

title: Eric Louis 2016 Alphonse Dolly Les Doigts d'Or de Dolly Pinot Noir (Vin de France)
description: This cool-climate Pinot Noir is soft and gentle. Its ripe tannins and cherry flavors are both lightly structured and juicy. Although still young, it's ready to drink.
designation: Alphonse Dolly Les Doigts d'Or de Dolly

title: Fabbioli Cellars 2013 Chambourcin (Virginia)
description: This wine is abundant with aromas of cherry Coke, sarsaparilla and baking spice. The palate is delicate yet is given some weight from seven months in neutral French and American oak. This wine gains a soft texture from Tannat skins added during fermentation.

title: Florent Descombe NV Syrah (Vin de France)
description: This spicy, strongly perfumed wine is full of fruit and juicy acidity. It's dry and structured, with a firm backdrop of tannins. It will be great for the winter.

title: Finca El Origen 2015 Estate Chardonnay (Mendoza)
description: Clean, fresh, stony aromas are basic but good. A round palate benefits from citric kick, while this tastes of mixed tropical fruits backed by skins-based bitterness.

title: Fiuza 2016 3 Castas Red (Tejo)
description: The three grapes (castas) are Touriga Nacional, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon. The blend makes a satisfyingly structured wine with some firm tannins as well as ripe fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Florent Descombe NV Merlot (Vin de France)
description: This is a smooth, ripe and generous wine befitting southern Merlot. It has just the right amount of acidity, black currant fruitiness and a smoky aftertaste.
